column2: }}'''''Utumno''''' is a dungeon-crawling rogue-like game. Development of the game was started in [[1996]] by [[Matt Craighead]], who was the main designer. ''Utumno'' was cancelled in [[1998]] when Matt stopped working on the game,<ref name="archive">[http://utumno.medicinestorm.com/archive/index.php?sid=b80697c35c335bce833ceb2b54b3667f Matt Craighead's Utumno, archive]</ref> but was revived in [[2009]] when another designer decided to work on it.<ref name="archive"/> The game is still in development.
